story.text: SAN FRANCISCO Jan 3 U.S. inland barge fleet Kirby Corp. (KEX.N) on Wednesday said it purchased the stock of Coastal Towing Inc. for $19.3 million and said it bought 21 tank barges from Cypress Barge Leasing for $15 million. "We anticipate the two purchases will be slightly accretive to 2007 earnings per share. EBITDA from these purchases for 2007 is projected at approximately $11 million," Joe Pyne, Kirby's chief executive said in a statement. The Houston-based company confirmed its fourth-quarter earnings forecast of 40 cents to 45 cents per share and its full-year outlook calling for earnings of $1.74 to $1.79 per share.
story.title: kirby announces purchases of stock , tank barges
